from operator import itemgetter
from collections import defaultdict

words = set()

with open("/kaggle/input/5-letter-words/5_letter_words.txt", "r") as f:
    for line in f.readlines():
        word = line.strip().lower()
        if len(set(list(word))) == 5:
            words.add(word)
